Hi Mikaela,

Thanks for getting back to me — I hope you’re having a great week!

Could you please send through a screenshot of what you’re seeing? The site was built a few years ago using the default Word 2007 format, so there’s a chance that recent Word updates possibly applied automatically, are causing compatibility issues.

We encountered a similar issue with the syd-proposal platform, which required updating the script that exports to the Word document in order to resolve it.

Once I can see the issue, I’ll be able to investigate further.

Hi Joel!

Thanks for your email.

Our version of Word hasn't changed (well, not that me or Ben are aware of) so I'm not sure why this issue has come up now, as it worked previously with no issues before?

Mikaela Camilleri

Hi Mikaela,

Hope you're doing well!

Just a quick note—looks like the Word file being exported from the platform isn’t fully compatible with your current version of Word.

To fix this, we’ll need to update part of the Word export code. It should take about 1–3 hours.

Let me know if you’d like us to go ahead with the update—I’ll get it scheduled right away.

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
